column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Not a fan of them
column2: and it disappoints me to say the least. Everyone I've talked to has raved and awarded Lou Malnati's with the title of having the best deep dish pizza in Chicago
column3: so I had some pretty high expectations going in. Maybe too high. I came here with my boyfriend for his birthday after our original reservations at a different restaurant had fallen through. Once we arrived
column4: we were told it would be about an hour wait which I totally expect. It's what you have to deal with when you go to a popular restaurant
column5: especially one that doesn't take reservations. We pre-ordered our pizza and decided to go with a medium classic. After about an hour
column6: we got a text that our table was ready and headed upstairs.
